creator: Coop Danmark A/S
descriptionHtml:
COOP IS A DANISH APP FOR EVERYONE
As a member of Coop you get a lot out of using the app, but even if you’re not a member there are great reasons for downloading the app. Now you can download, register and use many of the best features without being a member of Coop. So there are no excuses for not playing games and activating personal offers and AppKup in the new year.
descriptionShort: * Play in app games and win prices * Personal offers and AppKup every week

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New in this version:

• In this update we have made minor corrections and performance improvements.

Any ideas for the app? Email us at feedback@coop.dk.

Not a Coop app user yet? Create a profile and get access to the app.

· Vi vil gerne gøre det endnu mere sikkert for dig at betale med app'en. Grundet ny lovgivning og øget sikkerhed vil du fremover blive bedt om at godkende brug af dit betalingskort på alle de enheder, du logger ind på.

Har du en god ide til app’en? Send os en mail på feedback@coop.dk.

Ikke bruger af Coop app’en endnu? Opret en profil og få adgang til app’en med det samme.

title: Coop – Buy Online, Scan & Pay, AppKup, Offers

creator: Coop Danmark A/S
descriptionHtml:
COOP IS A DANISH APP FOR EVERYONE
As a member of Coop you get a lot out of using the app, but even if you’re not a member there are great reasons for downloading the app. Now you can download, register and use many of the best features without being a member of Coop. So there are no excuses for not playing games and activating personal offers and AppKup.

title: Coop – Buy Online, Scan & Pay

creator: Coop Danmark A/S
descriptionHtml:
Our app makes shopping easier and more convenient, whether you’re at home, on the go, or in any of the following Coop stores:
• Fakta
• Irma
• Coop 365
• Super Brugsen
• Daglig Brugsen
• Kvickly
• Coop.dk/mad
• Coop.dk/shopping

The app is packed with great offers and features that make shopping easier, faster and more fun. Here is couple of highlights:

1. Get the best deals and earn bonus on the products you love!
2. Browse your personalized offers and receive exclusive member deals
3. Jump the queue with Scan and Pay
4. Play games and win new fantastic prizes every week!
5. Browse Coop’s online catalogues and pop them straight onto a digital shopping list
6. Get digital receipts and follow what you have saved in bonuses and discounts
7. Order food online and get it delivered straight to your doorstep
8. Earn and pay for your products with Bonus.
9. Sign up to Prime and get a 15% bonus on a wide range of products
10. Find recipes – there are over 8.000 recipes to choose from.
11. Coop Shopping lists – Plan and follow your next shopping trip
12. Measure and reduce your carbon footprint!

THE COOP APP IS FOR EVERYONE – YOU DON’T NEED TO BE A MEMBER OF COOP!
There are many good reasons to use the app, even if you aren’t a Coop member. You can easily create a profil as a non-member and get access to features like Scan & Pay, games, Prime and a host of offers.

SCAN & PAY – JUMP THE QUEUE!
It has never been easier to shop with Scan & Pay. You can either scan products on-the-go or scan all your products at the end of your shop at the self-service check-out.

PLAY FUN GAMES AND WIN REAL PRIZES!
There are new games every week, with big chances to win fantastic prices. Collect your prizes in a Coop store near you.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

ORDER YOUR GROCERIES ONLINE – DELIVERED STRAIGHT TO YOUR DOORSTEP
‘Shop online’ makes it quick and easy top order your food online from home. Choose delivery time, add items to your basket and complete your transaction.

PRIME: MORE BONUS – MORE BENEFITS
Get more out of the money you already spend on groceries – with Prime. Earn up to 15% bonus on the products you normally purchase and get access to a wide range of benefits – from streaming services to experience days and more.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program. Coops’ partners include:
Tivoli, Legoland, Lalandia and many more.
descriptionShort: Buy groceries directly in the app. Scan items with Scan & Pay. Play games

Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

ORDER YOUR GROCERIES ONLINE – DELIVERED STRAIGHT TO YOUR DOORSTEP
‘Shop online’ makes it quick and easy top order your food online from home. Choose delivery time, add items to your basket and complete your transaction.

PRIME: MORE BONUS – MORE BENEFITS
Get more out of the money you already spend on groceries – with Prime. Earn up to 15% bonus on the products you normally purchase and get access to a wide range of benefits – from streaming services to experience days and more.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program. Coops’ partners include:
Tivoli, Legoland, Lalandia and many more.
descriptionShort: Buy groceries directly in the app. Scan items with Scan & Pay. Play games

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New in this version:
- Now you can choose what product variant you want to add to the shopping list while browsing the digital offer catalogue.
- We added a counter showing you how many offers you have activated.
- We improved the text and flow of the dialogue informing you that your credit card is about to expire.
- Minor corrections and performance improvements.

Any ideas for the app? Email us at feedback@coop.dk.

THE COOP APP IS FOR EVERYONE – YOU DON’T NEED TO BE A MEMBER OF COOP!
There are many good reasons to use the app, even if you aren’t a Coop member. You can easily create a profil as a non-member and get access to features like Scan & Pay, games, Prime and a host of offers.

SCAN & PAY – JUMP THE QUEUE!
It has never been easier to shop with Scan & Pay. You can either scan products on-the-go or scan all your products at the end of your shop at the self-service check-out.

PLAY FUN GAMES AND WIN REAL PRIZES!
There are new games every week, with big chances to win fantastic prices. Collect your prizes in a Coop store near you.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

ORDER YOUR GROCERIES ONLINE – DELIVERED STRAIGHT TO YOUR DOORSTEP
‘Shop online’ makes it quick and easy top order your food online from home. Choose delivery time, add items to your basket and complete your transaction.

PRIME: MORE BONUS – MORE BENEFITS
Get more out of the money you already spend on groceries – with Prime. Earn up to 15% bonus on the products you normally purchase and get access to a wide range of benefits – from streaming services to experience days and more.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program. Coops’ partners include:
Tivoli, Legoland, Lalandia and many more.
descriptionShort: Buy groceries directly in the app. Scan items with Scan & Pay. Play games

5. Browse Coop’s online catalogues and pop them straight onto a digital shopping list
6. Get digital receipts and follow what you have saved in bonuses and discounts
7. Order food online and get it delivered straight to your doorstep
8. Earn and pay for your products with Bonus.
9. Sign up to Prime and get a 15% bonus on a wide range of products
10. Find recipes – there are over 8.000 recipes to choose from.
11. Coop Shopping lists – Plan and follow your next shopping trip
12. Measure and reduce your carbon footprint!

THE COOP APP IS FOR EVERYONE – YOU DON’T NEED TO BE A MEMBER OF COOP!
There are many good reasons to use the app, even if you aren’t a Coop member. You can easily create a profil as a non-member and get access to features like Scan & Pay, games, Prime and a host of offers.

SCAN & PAY – JUMP THE QUEUE!
It has never been easier to shop with Scan & Pay. You can either scan products on-the-go or scan all your products at the end of your shop at the self-service check-out.

PLAY FUN GAMES AND WIN REAL PRIZES!
There are new games every week, with big chances to win fantastic prices. Collect your prizes in a Coop store near you.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

ORDER YOUR GROCERIES ONLINE – DELIVERED STRAIGHT TO YOUR DOORSTEP
‘Shop online’ makes it quick and easy top order your food online from home. Choose delivery time, add items to your basket and complete your transaction.

PRIME: MORE BONUS – MORE BENEFITS
Get more out of the money you already spend on groceries – with Prime. Earn up to 15% bonus on the products you normally purchase and get access to a wide range of benefits – from streaming services to experience days and more.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program. Coops’ partners include:
Tivoli, Legoland, Lalandia and many more.
descriptionShort: Buy groceries directly in the app. Scan items with Scan & Pay. Play games

• Kvickly
• Coop.dk/mad
• Coop.dk/shopping

The app is packed with great offers and features that make shopping easier, faster and more fun. Here is couple of highlights:

1. Get the best deals and earn bonus on the products you love!
2. Browse your personalized offers and receive exclusive member deals
3. Jump the queue with Scan and Pay
4. Play games and win new fantastic prizes every week!
5. Browse Coop’s online catalogues and pop them straight onto a digital shopping list
6. Get digital receipts and follow what you have saved in bonuses and discounts
7. Order food online and get it delivered straight to your doorstep
8. Earn and pay for your products with Bonus.
9. Sign up to Prime and get a 15% bonus on a wide range of products
10. Find recipes – there are over 8.000 recipes to choose from.
11. Coop Shopping lists – Plan and follow your next shopping trip
12. Measure and reduce your carbon footprint!

THE COOP APP IS FOR EVERYONE – YOU DON’T NEED TO BE A MEMBER OF COOP!
There are many good reasons to use the app, even if you aren’t a Coop member. You can easily create a profil as a non-member and get access to features like Scan & Pay, games, Prime and a host of offers.

SCAN & PAY – JUMP THE QUEUE!
It has never been easier to shop with Scan & Pay. You can either scan products on-the-go or scan all your products at the end of your shop at the self-service check-out.

PLAY FUN GAMES AND WIN REAL PRIZES!
There are new games every week, with big chances to win fantastic prices. Collect your prizes in a Coop store near you.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

ORDER YOUR GROCERIES ONLINE – DELIVERED STRAIGHT TO YOUR DOORSTEP
‘Shop online’ makes it quick and easy top order your food online from home. Choose delivery time, add items to your basket and complete your transaction.

PRIME: MORE BONUS – MORE BENEFITS
Get more out of the money you already spend on groceries – with Prime. Earn up to 15% bonus on the products you normally purchase and get access to a wide range of benefits – from streaming services to experience days and more.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program. Coops’ partners include:
Tivoli, Legoland, Lalandia and many more.
descriptionShort: Buy groceries directly in the app. Scan items with Scan & Pay. Play games

Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

ORDER YOUR GROCERIES ONLINE – DELIVERED STRAIGHT TO YOUR DOORSTEP
‘Shop online’ makes it quick and easy top order your food online from home. Choose delivery time, add items to your basket and complete your transaction.

PRIME: MORE BONUS – MORE BENEFITS
Get more out of the money you already spend on groceries – with Prime. Earn up to 15% bonus on the products you normally purchase and get access to a wide range of benefits – from streaming services to experience days and more.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program. Coops’ partners include:
Tivoli, Legoland, Lalandia and many more.

• Coop 365
• Super Brugsen
• Daglig Brugsen
• Kvickly
• Coop.dk/mad
• Coop.dk/shopping

The app is packed with great offers and features that make shopping easier, faster and more fun. Here is couple of highlights:

1. Get the best deals and earn bonus on the products you love!
2. Browse your personalized offers and receive exclusive member deals
3. Jump the queue with Scan and Pay
4. Play games and win new fantastic prizes every week!
5. Browse Coop’s online catalogues and pop them straight onto a digital shopping list
6. Get digital receipts and follow what you have saved in bonuses and discounts
7. Order food online and get it delivered straight to your doorstep
8. Earn and pay for your products with Bonus.
9. Sign up to Prime and get a 15% bonus on a wide range of products
10. Find recipes – there are over 8.000 recipes to choose from.
11. Coop Shopping lists – Plan and follow your next shopping trip
12. Measure and reduce your carbon footprint!

THE COOP APP IS FOR EVERYONE – YOU DON’T NEED TO BE A MEMBER OF COOP!
There are many good reasons to use the app, even if you aren’t a Coop member. You can easily create a profil as a non-member and get access to features like Scan & Pay, games, Prime and a host of offers.

SCAN & PAY – JUMP THE QUEUE!
It has never been easier to shop with Scan & Pay. You can either scan products on-the-go or scan all your products at the end of your shop at the self-service check-out.

PLAY FUN GAMES AND WIN REAL PRIZES!
There are new games every week, with big chances to win fantastic prices. Collect your prizes in a Coop store near you.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

ORDER YOUR GROCERIES ONLINE – DELIVERED STRAIGHT TO YOUR DOORSTEP
‘Shop online’ makes it quick and easy top order your food online from home. Choose delivery time, add items to your basket and complete your transaction.

PRIME: MORE BONUS – MORE BENEFITS
Get more out of the money you already spend on groceries – with Prime. Earn up to 15% bonus on the products you normally purchase and get access to a wide range of benefits – from streaming services to experience days and more.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program.
descriptionShort: Buy groceries directly in the app. Scan items with Scan & Pay. Play games

The app is packed with great offers and features that make shopping easier, faster and more fun. Here is couple of highlights:

1. Get the best deals and earn bonus on the products you love!
2. Browse your personalized offers and receive exclusive member deals
3. Jump the queue with Scan and Pay
4. Play games and win new fantastic prizes every week!
5. Get digital receipts and follow what you have saved in bonuses and discounts
6. Earn and pay for your products with Bonus.
7. Find recipes – there are over 8.000 recipes to choose from.
8. Coop Shopping lists – Plan and follow your next shopping trip
9. Measure and reduce your carbon footprint!

THE COOP APP IS FOR EVERYONE – YOU DON’T NEED TO BE A MEMBER OF COOP!
There are many good reasons to use the app, even if you aren’t a Coop member. You can easily create a profil as a non-member and get access to features like Scan & Pay, games, Prime and a host of offers.

SCAN & PAY – JUMP THE QUEUE!
It has never been easier to shop with Scan & Pay. You can either scan products on-the-go or scan all your products at the end of your shop at the self-service check-out.

PLAY FUN GAMES AND WIN REAL PRIZES!
There are new games every week, with big chances to win fantastic prices. Collect your prizes in a Coop store near you.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program.

THE COOP APP IS FOR EVERYONE – YOU DON’T NEED TO BE A MEMBER OF COOP!
There are many good reasons to use the app, even if you aren’t a Coop member. You can easily create a profil as a non-member and get access to features like Scan & Pay, games, Prime and a host of offers.

SCAN & PAY – JUMP THE QUEUE!
It has never been easier to shop with Scan & Pay. You can either scan products on-the-go or scan all your products at the end of your shop at the self-service check-out.

PLAY FUN GAMES AND WIN REAL PRIZES!
There are new games every week, with big chances to win fantastic prices. Collect your prizes in a Coop store near you.

EARN UP TO 15% BONUS WITH COOP ‘FORDELSKONTO’ (BENEFITS ACCOUNT)
Sign up for a ’FordelsKonto’ (benefits account) and get up to 15% i bonus on the Coop brands you buy every week!
Imagine a world where the products that you purchase most, are always discounted! Choose which products you’d like to earn bonus on – from a long list of Coop own-brands.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

APP OFFERS
All you need to do is install the Coop app to get your hands on a tempting range of carefully selected goods at the lowest possible prices. There are fresh App offers every Friday.
You need to activate your app offers before you start your shopping trip – for instance, before you scan products when using Scan & pay, or before you register the Coop app at the checkout.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

APP OFFERS
All you need to do is install the Coop app to get your hands on a tempting range of carefully selected goods at the lowest possible prices. There are fresh App offers every Friday.
You need to activate your app offers before you start your shopping trip – for instance, before you scan products when using Scan & pay, or before you register the Coop app at the checkout.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program.
descriptionShort: Scan items with Scan & Pay. Play games, app offers
title: Coop – Scan & Pay, App offers

creator: Coop Danmark A/S
descriptionHtml:
Our app makes shopping easier and more convenient, whether you’re at home, on the go, or in any of the following Coop stores:

• Irma
• Coop 365
• Super Brugsen
• Daglig Brugsen
• Kvickly
• Coop.dk

The app is packed with great offers and features that make shopping easier, faster and more fun:

1. 1. Get the best deals and earn bonus on the products you love!
2. Browse your personalized offers and receive exclusive member deals
3. Jump the queue with Scan and Pay
4. Sign up for a ’FordelsKonto’ (benefits account) and get up to 15% i bonus on the Coop brands you buy every week!
5. Play games and win new fantastic prizes every week!
6. Get digital receipts and follow what you have saved in bonuses and discounts
7. Earn and pay for your products with Bonus.
8. Find recipes – there are over 8.000 recipes to choose from.
9. Coop Shopping lists – Plan and follow your next shopping trip
10. Measure and reduce your carbon footprint!

THE COOP APP IS FOR EVERYONE – YOU DON’T NEED TO BE A MEMBER OF COOP!
There are many good reasons to use the app, even if you aren’t a Coop member. You can easily create a profil as a non-member and get access to features like Scan & Pay, games, 'Fordelskonto' (benefits account) and a host of offers.

SCAN & PAY – JUMP THE QUEUE!
It has never been easier to shop with Scan & Pay. You can either scan products on-the-go or scan all your products at the end of your shop at the self-service check-out.

PLAY FUN GAMES AND WIN REAL PRIZES!
There are new games every week, with big chances to win fantastic prices. Collect your prizes in a Coop store near you.

EARN UP TO 15% BONUS WITH COOP ‘FORDELSKONTO’ (BENEFITS ACCOUNT)
Sign up for a ’FordelsKonto’ and get up to 15% i bonus on the Coop brands you buy every week!
Imagine a world where the products that you purchase most, are always discounted! Choose which products you’d like to earn bonus on – from a long list of Coop own-brands.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION

1. 1. Get the best deals and earn bonus on the products you love!
2. Browse your personalized offers and receive exclusive member deals
3. Jump the queue with Scan and Pay
4. Sign up for a ’FordelsKonto’ (benefits account) and get up to 15% i bonus on the Coop brands you buy every week!
5. Play games and win new fantastic prizes every week!
6. Get digital receipts and follow what you have saved in bonuses and discounts
7. Earn and pay for your products with Bonus.
8. Find recipes – there are over 8.000 recipes to choose from.
9. Coop Shopping lists – Plan and follow your next shopping trip
10. Measure and reduce your carbon footprint!

THE COOP APP IS FOR EVERYONE – YOU DON’T NEED TO BE A MEMBER OF COOP!
There are many good reasons to use the app, even if you aren’t a Coop member. You can easily create a profil as a non-member and get access to features like Scan & Pay, games, 'Fordelskonto' (benefits account) and a host of offers.

SCAN & PAY – JUMP THE QUEUE!
It has never been easier to shop with Scan & Pay. You can either scan products on-the-go or scan all your products at the end of your shop at the self-service check-out.

PLAY FUN GAMES AND WIN REAL PRIZES!
There are new games every week, with big chances to win fantastic prices. Collect your prizes in a Coop store near you.

EARN UP TO 15% BONUS WITH COOP ‘FORDELSKONTO’ (BENEFITS ACCOUNT)
Sign up for a ’FordelsKonto’ and get up to 15% i bonus on the Coop brands you buy every week!
Imagine a world where the products that you purchase most, are always discounted! Choose which products you’d like to earn bonus on – from a long list of Coop own-brands.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

APP OFFERS
All you need to do is install the Coop app to get your hands on a tempting range of carefully selected goods at the lowest possible prices. There are fresh App offers every Friday.
You need to activate your app offers before you start your shopping trip – for instance, before you scan products when using Scan & pay, or before you register the Coop app at the checkout.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program.

CATALOGUES AND PROMOTIONS
Browse all Coop’s catalogues and promotions to find the very best offers and discounts available to you – including coop.dk/shopping. Add discounted items to your digital shopping list and purchase them online for home delivery.

CHECK AND SAVE YOUR RECEIPTS
You can see your latest receipt in the app as soon as you have paid. Your app saves a copy of your receipt every time you shop, so you can keep a track of your purchases and take control of your grocery budget all in one place.

RECIPES AND FOOD INSPIRATION
Get daily cooking tips to help you with create a quick and easy dinner for the family, find healthy or vegetarian alternatives to your repertoire, or put construct a mouth-watering dinner-party menu. There are thousands of recipes and inspirational tips from the very best chefs at your fingertips.

EARN AND PAY WITH BONUS WHEN YOU SHOP AT COOP
Earn a bonus of 1% when you shop as a Coop member. When you have purchased items for more than 500 kroner per month in Coops’ stores you will earn 1% in bonus from your shopping for the rest of the month.

PERSONAL OFFERS
As a Coop member you can choose and activate up to 10 offers tailored to your personal tastes every week! Each offer is based on your personal preferences and purchase history, ensuring you get great value on the products you enjoy most.

APP OFFERS
All you need to do is install the Coop app to get your hands on a tempting range of carefully selected goods at the lowest possible prices. There are fresh App offers every Friday.
You need to activate your app offers before you start your shopping trip – for instance, before you scan products when using Scan & pay, or before you register the Coop app at the checkout.

OFFERS AND NEWS FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE
Keep an eye on the Coop app for products with an extra-low price in your local store. Check local news, community activities, live shopping events and much more.

BONUS AND DISCOUNTS FROM OUR PARTNERS
You can also earn bonus from our long list of partners in our member program.
